item.description:
Hi all,

I think we need to make the most of summer while it is here so we have picked two summer bars for the August Thirsty thursday drinks.

7-9
Sail Loft
180 Atlantic Avenue
Boston 02110

9 - onwards
We will move a couple of blocks away to Hannover Street where Fiore has a roof top bar.
250 Hannover Steet,
Boston 02113
When you walk in go stright up the stairs and then up a couple more stairs and out to the bar.

Hopefully two venues won't be too confusing but incase it is I will email out some cell phone numbers to those who RSVP.

Be good to see you all.

Amy & Steffen

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Thirsty First Thursday
